snippet: I was expected to hate this atypical liberal mayor, Edward Koch. It didn’t turn out that way.
lead_paragraph: I was expected to hate this atypical liberal mayor, Edward Koch. It didn’t turn out that way.

headline.seo: Ed Koch, a Man of Certitude and Joy
headline.main: A Man of Certitude and Joy
headline.print_headline: A Man of Certitude and Joy
